name: Shadowed Realms
description:
My second entry to the annual 7 day roguelike challenge.

This year I went for a 3D game, and it went better than expected!

The game is set in an unknown dungeon where you have to fight through rooms of enemies to get to the final boss.

I wanted to create a system for picking up upgrades and new weapons, but due to time, I wasn't able to finish this in time.
